name: Timothy Baldwin
text: My sweet lady went in to get us a six pack of mountain dews. When she came back out we opened 1 and the seal didn't break on the lid. So, she went back in and the store rep was nice enough to let us exchange it for another six pack. Thanks 😊 It could have meant our health.

text: This is the nicest, cleanest abd well stocked Dollar General I have shopped. I pray it stays thus way!!! Staff is very friendly and helpful. Hwy 80 location in Alabama is we worth the trip to shop.

name: Curstina Moorer
text: Clean

name: Stacie Looney
text: So after posting my problem with this store location , the store owner reached out to us and listened to our problem with the bed . He also had our order in front of him . He had taken the the time to track the bed frame  down for us and have it brought out the next day . This is what customer service is about . We didn’t want a whole new system we just wanted the defective one switched out . The Manager at this store needs to learn that customer service is a big part of sales and if you don’t listen and help it will kill your business. Thank you Nicolas for your kindness , attentiveness, and taking care of us . We will be back !

resp.text: Looney family we appreciate you as a customer and we want every customer happy.  We will work harder to be the best in the business. Thank you for giving us a chance to fix the issue. We learn a lot from our customers and your review helps us to get better. We promise to take your experience and grow. Every customer is important to us. We are not existing with out y’all!

name: Phil&Lisa Bonanno
text:
Third mattress from them! Matt the manager knows his stuff and is always helpful and takes his time!! Showed up 5 minutes till 6:00 never rushed me, explained in detail and courtesy. Ended up leaving almost 30 minutes later. Another bar set high for customer service!
First one in the old store.
Second in Guntersville.
Third one in their newer store.
Top notch and all three locations!!
Thanks will be back again!!
Phil Bonanno

resp.text: Phil Thank You, Thank You for the REPEAT BUSINESS & the 5-star review. We love selling mattresses. You are appreciated! Sleep good 💤💤💤

name: Jason stallings
text: Great deals and super customer service! No high pressure sales and lots to choose from.

resp.text: Jason thanks for taking time to give us a five star review. We know you have options when picking out a mattress and we strive to be the best with a great experience. Thanks for your business and the kind words

name: Carla Bates
text: These guys are awesome. They are very friendly and were willing to wait on us to pick the right one for us.

resp.text: Carla our goal is to provide 5 star service with a friendly not pushy atmosphere. We appreciate the 5 star review. Your business is important to us! Sleep Good!

name: Chris Barnes
text: Fast, friendly, and courteous.  I would definitely use them again.

resp.text: Thank you for taking time to leave us a review.  We strive to be friendly, knowledgeable, courteous and not pushy but helpful. If we can do anything to take it from a 4 star review to a 5 star let me know @ ChadricDover@yahoo.com

name: Penny Johnson
text: Friendly service, love that the mattress I wanted was in stock and didn’t have to be ordered!!

resp.text: Penny thank you for the review. We work hard to keep all mattresses in stock. Thank you for the kind words.

name: Sonny Foster
text: Great deal on I king split adjustable base & Sealy mattresses, saved almost $1000.00

resp.text: We love helping our customers save money. Your business is appreciated!!! Sleep good!!!

name: Patrick Barnett
text: I love my new mattress. It was easy and the staff was helpful. All I had to do was pick out my mattress and they took care of everything else. Thank you guys!

resp.text: Pattrick thank you for taking time to give us a five star review we really enjoyed working with you and appreciate your business.

name: Kayla Willingham
text: Great customer service amazon beds and awesome bed

resp.text: Kayla we appreciate you and your business. Hope you sleep good.

name: Isaac Elliott
text: Great place to shop for a mattress. Reasonable prices and awesome service from Andy, Nick and Jimmy.

resp.text: Hey!! We appreciate the business and taking time to give us a review. We love our customers.

name: Shelby Bennett
text: A great place. Andy helped me so much with my mattress and gave us a great deal with me being a college student !

resp.text: Shelby thank you for the 5 star review. We appreciate your business and the opportunity to help you find the perfect mattress.

name: Cheryl Hardy
text: Friendly stsff

resp.text: Cheryl thank you for the kind words and 5 star review. We appreciate you!!!

resp.text: Thank you for taking time to review our store. We really appreciate your business.

I nicely suggested to put a sign at the door so other people will know, and the MANAGER answered me “NOO We can’t do that “ so rude! Never coming to this store again, Never!

Check yourself before you wreck yourself FREDS.

name: Jessica Holland
text: HATEFUL workers. I do have a factory connection where I live. I was excited to find one. I did not notice the 4 items only sign in the dressing room. I had three dresses and my 10 yr old daughter wanted to try on two dresses. I locked the dressing room door and was completely undressed when the store clerk used her key to unlock it and slung the door open. I pulled it back closed and she asked through the door how many I had. I said I have three and my daughter has 2. She said well that's more than 4. I said I wasn't going to put my 10 yr old in a dressing room alone. We left after that. She did not have to be so rude!

Wow. The Best Dollar General around!

name: Maranda Fortenberry
text: The Family Dollar Store in Somerville.AL. is great. They usually have good weekly sales and great clearance items. The store is never cluttered and always clean. The employees are always friendly and helpful. I recommend going at night because they have a guy that works that shift that goes out of his way to help you and always makes sure to inform you of all sale and discounted items. He is just so helpful. Family Dollar should really pay attention to what a benefit he is for the company. I'm so sorry I can't remember his name at the moment but I will be posting it as soon as I can.

text: Love this place!!..If your looking for clean, organized, and friendly bargain shopping then steals and deals is  where you want to go!...The deals you can get in this place are amazing! If you have been then your literally missing out!! A wonderful family running a wonderful business!!!!

name: Kevin Goodno
text: What can I say about the place other than its the best bin store EVER. Forget the fact that the coolest people run it (The Landers family, even Lilbit)...the finds here are incredible. This is a weekly destination for my friends and I, and we always come away with fantastic deals. The owners make the atmosphere fun too, with monthly giveaways and mystery bags with a smorgasbord of goodies inside. The entire Landers clan also gets out and interacts with their people, something you just don't see in many businesses anymore. Long story short, this place is a treat not to be missed. Stop in sometime, you never know what treasure waits for you to dig up in Somerville.

name: Courtney Prewitt
text: I went to this family dollar at 7:43 pm Friday and the doors were locked. They were walking around trying to leave rather than taking business. I am still working in all this too, so even this pandemic especially that some sales are down for most businesses and completely closed for others does an employee make the call to turn away money. You adjusted you hrs to close earlier. That’s the only adjustment that would be acceptable. I go because it’s of the convenience, but I’ll just make that longer drive to Walmart. The rudeness of the no cash back and no sign posted is the other issue. Another place you lose money. Day light and a crowed store so giving cash back shouldn’t be an issue. Cashier rudely told me this after canceling my request just say rude hitting the buttons hard to stop it. I don’t care what the demographics are. I am a general manager to be clear. Non of these actions are justified because not all customers should be given the issue because of color or the area. I could walk in looking like I got out the bef but I have a different story and you don’t know my intelligence level. So you assume acting this way is okay. It’s not just this one and and it’s not all of them because some are very pleasant and customer friendly.

name: Aimee Warren-Mitchell
text:
I have a number of issues with this particular store. Number one this store is never organized.  The aisles are constantly blocked by  stock and so on. Which brings me to my next issue. How is it that you constantly have stock and merchandise blocking  the aisles yet never seem to have anything? Also as for corporate if you require someone to leave their bags upfront then yall need to make sure they are safe. If it is your policy then you should take responsibility to make sure bags are secured! Just as you dont trust  your customers then why should i do so with my personal items or items already purchased?
This past Monday i happened to need an item and it was raining, before i could get in the door  "you gotta take that hood off" i knew that but i was already preparing to do so just not in the rain!. Then once i got ready to  pay for my purchases i stood at the counter 4 minutes and 32 seconds before both the cashier and manager returned to the front of the store and counter. Yes both of them saw me .. a few times standing there.. I choose not to share there discussion. Customer service has gone done since that young man has become manager.

name: Christy Deason
text:
Some very nice people work here. I have little complaints from time to time and all I have to do is address them and Fred's is pretty good about resolving any issues in a timely manner. No One is perfect and that goes for Stores, Restaurants, any public place.  Most places will work with you to RESOLVE any issues simply because it is not worth having bad reviews posted online for the world to see. WORD OF MOUTH can make or break a business.
There are alot of people who just love drama and will go straight to the internet to completely bash a business without even giving management the chance to rectify a wrong. Half the time they never even knew there was an issue until they were affected by a bad review.
Any issue I have ever had with this store was always resolved once I spoke with management and for that I give this Fred's in Evergreen a 5-star review.

name: Breanicia Turner
text: Not only was I racially profiled a couple months back by an employee named India. India who is always on her phone ringing up customers, snarling at people she doesn't like, and just being plain rude. Tonight I went in and asked where I could find a green polo shirt bc I planned on being India for Halloween to make light of a situation that really hurt my feelings. To be followed around a store bc of the color of my skin. So to make matters worse after asking Carrie the manager where I could find a polo she told me the thrift store. So then I told her I was going to be India . Carrie was furious. She berated me and told me and all the other customers in the store it was their job to follow people that are stealing around dollar tree as if I was stealing . She yelled that India was doing her job and that it didn't matter which color the person was. Making it seem as if I am a thief. I'm in total disbelief bc I've known Carrie the manager for years. But the way she acted and talked to me tonight amongst other shoppers was ridiculous, mentally scarring, and just plain bad for business. I literally shop in dollar tree every single day. But this could all be changed very soon . Thanks to Carrie having a bad day. Then to make the situation my worst yet this year. I was apologizing to the cashier ringing me up telling her I knew the objectives of their job bc I was offered a management position about a year ago and had a application for the job in my car . Carrie the manager walks out and tells me to shut up and that the conversation is basically over. I said Carrie I was not talking to you I was speakkng to the cashier. I think it's sad when a person brings their personal life to work. I know Carrie has problems at home. So I told her I didn't know what she bad going on but I knew this wasn't her . Bottom line I won't be back to filbert ferry dollar tree for a while.

resp.text: Hi Mr Rhodes. We at Magic City closeouts appreciate you stopping in and taking the time out to review us and wished you had a better experience than you obviously did. But junk? I'm not sure what qualifies as junk to you but 75% of our items are new, in packages. Items like our Angel Soft tissue, Bounty paper towels, Pampers, Dove body wash & bar soap, 5 Gallon buckets of laundry detergent, socks of all sizes, an entire section of car care products and the list goes on. I would like to know what items you checked out? We can always try to do better and any suggestions you can give would be greatly appreciated. Thanks.

text:
Everything has changed in the Loaves & Fishes stores they look nice but the prices have went up. From what i gather, management has changed.
I used to would shop at several of the locations at least once a week. I would pick up things for others who were in need as well. If it didnt work for them at thrift prices i could afford to buy it & put it back til i found someone who could wear/use it.
Now I can't afford to do that. The last time I went shopping there, I came back with 3 used clothing items which cost me around $15. My mom came over with new clothes she had gotten on sell fot $1 at Walmart. The point of thrifting is being thrifty. JCPenny's & other department stores has new clothes for clearance around these prices.
I enjoy the "treasure seeking" process of going to the thrift store but it is more fun when the treasure wasn't wrestling for a spot in your budget.
I'm not the only one who feels this way. The parking lots used to stay full of customers. Now nit nearly as much traffic goes through there to weed through the donated goods. Thankfully there are more & more options popping up around our area.
I will still go by there sometimes but not my go to spots anymore.

name: Bertha Dozier
text:
LONG POST ALERT

I ordered a king size bedroom set and was told it would be arriving in 3 1/2 weeks.   The week of delivery I received a phone call from Miguel stating the bedroom set had arrived minus the dresser and mirror.   He went on to say that another set that was similar to the one I ordered was available.   I told him I would come in the store to look at it.  I ordered a grey bedroom. The one that was available was black.   Two different colors.   Told them I would take the one that I ordered and wait for the dresser and mirror.   Day of pick up, load the headboard, footboard and chest.  They tried to get me to sign the paperwork accepting delivery.   Refused because I was missing 2 nightstands and the rails.   They found the rails but no nightstands.   Was told the missing items were in the Mobile store.   I was promised that I would receive the items early Saturday. It's now 9:45 pm and still no delivery.   I have sat at home all day waiting on a non existent delivery.  Not a good way to conduct business.

Hello Bertha,

name: Josh Yates
text:
Overall, I'm satisfied with my purchase at the Montgomery, Alabama location.  Management was very good.  Prices seemed to be excellent.  Quality seemed to be excellent.  Selection was very good.  The -2 star is because of my delivery.  I paid $75 cash for delivery, which is fine.  But, after all my furniture was placed inside my apartment and the delivery men left, I failed to check to make sure everything was delivered correctly.  The next day I open the box that contained my headboard and it was the wrong size and color.  Management had a new headboard delivered to me, but the delivery man refused to take back the incorrect headboard because he said, "I don't have the paper.", so I took the headboard back to the American Freight warehouse.

Within the next few days, I opened the mirror to my dresser and it was the wrong color.  I took the mirror back to the American Freight warehouse and management swapped it out for me.  In the end, I happy with my furniture but it appears my $75 delivery cost was wasted on my end due to the driving back and forth a few times to fix a few mistakes the delivery men made with my purchase.  Before the delivery men leave your location, double check your furniture.

name: Hollewood45

After a few phone calls and no furniture I decided to pay them a visit. The store manager Rodney went above and beyond to make sure that I got my furniture the following week. name: Kori Anderson
text:
DO NOT BUY FROM AMERICAN FREIGHT IN MONTGOMERY! They are very unprofessional and unorganized. We bought basically a whole house worth of furniture, when it was time for delivery they informed us that our sectional was not in stock and that it’ll be in stock in 2 weeks and that they’ll deliver it out to us with no delivery fee but we could still get our bedroom suite that we ordered.
Incident #1: On delivery day I had to call and ask what time would the furniture be in because we were out running errands. They forgot to put our furniture on the truck and the delivery people had to come back and get it🙄 (I’m sure if I had not called I would not have known)
Incident #2:Two weeks later, which was on yesterday (Sunday) at around 12pm I called and spoke with OJay and asked was our furniture in. She told me yes(why didn’t they call?) and that they can deliver it out same day. Okay cool. She then called back and said that we didn’t pay all of our delivery fee which in fact when they delivered our furniture the first time my boyfriend gave them the delivery free PLUS A TIP. She then told me that it was okay and that they would take care of it. Later that day, at 4pm, I called again just checking to see what time they would be coming. The guy I spoke with asked would I be okay with getting it delivered first thing Monday morning. Uhh no. (My problem with this was WHY DIDN’T ANYBODY CALL, I would be okay if they had the common courtesy to inform me of any issues instead of me having to call them.) The guy told me my furniture should be at my house no later than 10:45AM(I didn’t know how if they opened at 11am) I asked was he sure and he said yes.
SO THIS MORNING MY FURNITURE WAS NOT AT MY HOUSE AT 10:45! I called promptly AT 11am and spoke w/ the manger Rodney and he informed me that a driver was on the way to get my furniture to deliver it. If my furniture was not able to be at my house at 10:45AM they should have communicated that with me. I received my furniture at 12pm after all the mess I had to go through. I appreciate it if you guys would be more professional with your customers and communicated more with your drivers. I should not have to go through this hassle of getting furniture delivered and I WILL NOT shop with you guys again. Have a good day!!

name: Rachel Bu
text:
TL/DR: furniture took more than 2 months to arrive, company was no help over the phone, leather sectional arrived with corner scuffed. DO NOT RECOMMEND.

Full story: I shopped at American Freight on Black Friday 2017 with high expectations after reading these reviews. And the experience in the store was fine. No pressure to buy, but a helpful staff answering any questions my husband or I had. We bought a sectional and ottoman set we liked even though they weren't available for delivery for 2-3 weeks. We were fine with the delay and left looking forward to it arriving in a few weeks (more time to find homes for our old stuff).

That's when the trouble started. Fast forward 4 weeks, no sectional and no call/news at all. I call the store and was told that my purchase wasn't on the truck as expected, but they would be calling other stores to see of they had it and we should hear something the next week.

Life was busy so I didn't check again for another 3 weeks. This time when I called I was told they didn't know why, but it was on back order. But it would for sure be in the next week. I again expressed by hope that it would arrive as I very much looked forward to using my furniture.

2 weeks later, no furniture.  At this point, 2 months after purchasing the furniture and as my husband and I are both active duty military and didn't have the time to go to deal with it, my mother-in-law visited the store on a Friday. She made a bit of a scene stating the facts in front of other customers, and wouldn't you know it our sectional and ottoman arrived on rush order the following Monday. Corners were scuffed in some areas, and a few tears from packing staples, but at that point we were so glad to have the furniture  and tired of dealing with the company that we accepted it anyway. I will never shop there again  and highly recommend you don't either.

name: Wes Stigsell
text:
We decided to shop here due to the great reviews and the quality furniture and a great prices . However the great reviews must be only for furniture that they have in stock. The couch and love seat we really liked was not in stock and we were told it would be two weeks until our furniture would arrive This was 15th of July. It even said August 1st on the sales receipt.  Two weeks go by and we heard nothing. We called American Freight and we were told that they don't have a date that the truck will show up it will just show up one day. Three weeks out we had heard nothing and we're told it would take 2 to 4 weeks. At this point we would of asked for a refund and shopped somewhere else but their policy states you can get a refund after 4 weeks from purchase.  Now four weeks arrives still no furniture still no date a truck will arrive.  We call on Monday with all intentions to ask for a refund and were told there is a truck and the Manger will be in on Thursday for us to get a refund. Thursday comes no phone call from American Freight we call on Friday and we're told oh your couch is here. Alot of effort on our part to find the status on our order. So after 4 weeks and several days of a family of 5 sitting on the floor since we just moved to Montgomery we have our couch and love seat. When we picked them up we told them we were still in the market for furniture and we were told to come back and they will give us a good deal for being so patient  well why not give us a deal while we were there. We won't be back.
Going back to the day we purchased the furniture the couch and love seat we wanted they actually had in the back but it was already sold to a customer who was waiting for it to be delivered some sales people were telling our sales person to just give us that one but we would not do that to someone else. So it puts into question did our furniture arrive weeks ago and they sold it to someone else it's possible especially since they could never give us a date our furniture would arrive.
We do like the furniture but if you shop here and they don't have it in stock BEWARE you will never know when you will get it.

resp.text: We do apologize for the inconvenience, Wes. If there's anything we can do to rectify the situation, feel free to send us an email to social@ameircanfreight.us. Thanks!

name: Sylver Hooks
text: A few months ago, my husband and I purchased a dinette set from this location. When it was delivered, the delivery guy Preston had noticed they sent the wrong chairs but I had noticed the box with the table looked as if it had fallen off of the truck or dropped from a distance. After bringing in the table, they left and came back with the correct chairs. After putting together the chairs, I opened the box containing the table and it had indeed been dropped. It was well after store hours at this point but I still called the delivery guy with my issues. The next morning at 11 sharp, I got a call from the owner. Like he has obviously done before, apologized for it and said that he's send another out by the end of the day. TWO DAYS later, the table finally arrived. They opened the box to make sure that nothing is busted up and I was very pleased with the way it was handled. I was so pleased that we decided to order two more chairs from them. We were told that it took 2 weeks for the chairs to arrive. It was November 27th and we needed them before Christmas. Before they ordered the chairs, we had to pay and that wasn't an issue for us. We paid the full balance of nearly $180 for two Madrid. counter height chairs. Two weeks go by and no chairs. I was told that the truck hasn't come in but I'll definitely have them before Christmas. December 22nd, I gave them another call and I was told that I could pick them up the next day. I was overjoyed to hear that. On the 23rd I got a call from the manager telling me to not come because they wasn't there and he didn't want me to ride there for nothing. He said that he was just have them delivered when they came in. The delivery guy Preston brought to our home at 6pm that night. He told me that they were in a different box because they opened it to make sure that they sent the right chairs because of what happened the first time. Trusting his words, i signed for it then took them upstairs myself. I placed them in a closet, grabbed my things and left home until Saturday night. Christmas morning I pulled out the box, opened it and removed all of its contents. I then took the box to the dumpster. When I returned, I settled myself down to begin assembling the chairs only to find that the chairs HAD ONCE BEEN ASSEMBLED. There were marks on the chairs, the screws were stripped and rusty. and the floor protectors were very worn. There were also four screws missing as well. There were hand smudges all over the wood. There was nothing about those chairs that said NEW. In complete disbelief that Rodney the store manager for charge me full price for two chairs off the showroom floor then have me wait nearly a month to receive them made me a bit irate. Without thinking, I called the store on Christmas morning. After realizing, I messaged the delivery asking for the cell number of the manager and I've yet to receive an response. So as a result, I feel it's very necessary to be waiting in the parking lot with two unassemble Madrid counter height chairs and several questions that gonna require an answer as well as a solution. Until this, I thought very highly of American Freight and its coworkers. Now it's BUYERS BEWARE... there's a reason they say that all sales are finals. For me, I don't want my money back because I do want the chairs. I just want what I paid for and I DID NOT pay for recycled chairs

resp.text: We're very sorry to hear this happened to you, Sylver. If there's anything we can do for you, feel free to email us at social@americanfreight.us. Thanks!

name: BYRDIE Yeah

My eldery mother and i were just there yesterday looking at some furniture and i did
Not like our experience there at all. The salesman who served us had these real long dreadlocks and his salesmanship skills were the pits...he did not sale my mom and i what we wanted, what we liked nor did he offer to
Show us anything decent that would also fit
In our budget. Yes thats right he never showed us anything on sale nor did he bother to ask what our spending limit was so he know what to work with. Instead he just showed us around the store that highlighted
The furniture with the 699 and up prices.
We spotted a black leather sofa that had 398 price tag on it, sat on it to try it out, and as we began to show insterest in it and began discussing to each other about maybe we should get this or not. Thats when the salesman kinda brushed us away from the actual sofa set that we were sitting on that was 398 and started reverting us back toward that 699 plus tax sofa set. Smh thats not the sofa set we wanted or was discussing.we felt that the salesman wasnt offering us what we wanted but yet offer us what he wanted us to buy.....and we are the customers...its our money not his....we felt like our wants were disreguarded so we decided to check another store, told the guy we were gonna check somewhere else also before we decide. Asked him for a bussiness card and of course he didnt want to give us one and by him doing so gave us even more reason to be absolutely sure that we dont want to shop there now.
So as we started to walk out the door the guy then decided to offer us a deal on a sofa set
...A BETTER PRICE is what he said so im like oh ok he wants to work a deal on the actual leather sofa we were sitting on with the 398 price tax. So im like ok turn around and ask what are you offering...he reply...600 right now walk out..we refused and left and went somewhere else because once agin the guy was still attempting to sale us what he wanted us to buy rather than what we the customer wanted to spend our money on...

name: Robin Boydstun
text:
Today 7/16/2021 we went into money miser pawn to buy an air conditioner and they had 2. We purchased the more expensive of the 2 got it home 15 minutes later to find out that it didn't blow cold or have the remote control that goes to it so we called and ask if they had the remote that we couldn't change the temp and that it blows hot. The employee after putting us on hold for awhiles aid they don't refund for merchandise but they would give us $10 to go buy a remote for it. We paid $138 to them for an air conditioner that doesn't work. I must say I am very sad that I got ripped off.
I don't recommend them at all

resp.text: Hello My name is Ken Barnes, I am the General Manager here at Money Mizer. When you called  you spoke to one of my employees that works here and asked if we had the remote. We did not have the remote. You stated that you needed the remote to change some settings on it and that you could not get it cold enough without the remote. My employee made me aware of what went on and that you were asking for a remote control that we did not have, we did place you on a brief hold so we could find the remote locally for you and offered to refund the cost of the remote as you stated you just needed the remote to change the settings. We tracked one down here locally we told you exactly where it was and the price for it and offered to refund that part of the sale to cover the cost of the remote. I am sorry if you feel like this is bad customer service if you would like to come in and see me I would be happy to speak with you about this situation.

Girl, YOU ROCK!

Brutus says "Thank You!"! He wishes he could  give you a big sloppy kiss, but he realizes thst his kisses, while meaning to shown appreciation, tend to have the opposite of the desired effect...too much slobber going on!!! LOL.

Seriously though, from the bottom of my heart, thank you infinity!

S.R. and Family

name: Ms. Marie
text: I must be experiencing a different Family Dollar than those who are rating this store 5 stars.  I won't say all I have seen in there, but it is a very dirty, and unkempt store.  The current manager has to only be there for a paycheck.  When it first opened, the guy who ran that store would get rid of anyone who had nasty attitudes, and he kept that store clean and looking good.  This new manager, not a chance.  It is nothing to be making a purchase and the cashiers are on the phones arguing with their boyfriends.  There is another Family Dollar down the road and I will pass this one to instead shop at that one.  Family Dollar places these stores in mostly black neighborhoods, and does just enough, which is deplorable.  I should never go in a store where I am purchasing any foodstuffs and see rodents running across the floor.  Let me be clear however, there are one or two of the young ladies on staff there who do all they can to make this store better, but they are not manager, so they can only do so much.  I hate to be critical, but FD should be ashamed of themselves to allow these stores to be ran as such.

name: LaTrice Silar (MzTrice)
text: This is the closest family dollar store near my home and I can't even shop here because the debit machine is not working which it's been approximately two months now. This is a serious problem because most people use their debit cards and a lot of people are members of the smart spin club such as myself which you have to input your phone number in order to receive your coupons that you've clipped and some earned by free spins!!! By the machine being down this is not possible. I spend$50 plus dollars a week in Family Dollar and I want to use my coupons. This really is an outrage how corporate the district manager or whomever has let this problem linger so long. I spent almost$80 yesterday and the cashier was really sweet because she manually gave me the smart spin coupons but the rude store manager gets upset because it was a long line behind me. How about you get on the other register and take care of the guests because I wanted my coupons and she was only doing her job... The nerve of her. Take that anger and frustration out on corporate or whomever is responsible for taking care of this issue. You're already losing money don't due to something you can't control but don't lose more customers because of your terrible attitude. Overall I love family Dollar but this one is horrible 😢

I have NEVER came across two family dollar employees that were more pleasant and helpful and just doggone happy than these two.  The young man was opening the door for customers and asking if they needed assistance while in the store. He even watched customers to their cars to be sure they made it safely which is a big thing as this area has had an big increase in crime lately. Let me not forget about the cashier, she was very talkative and interactive woth the customers and coworkers.  It just seem like these had some kind of joy on them. I hate i didn't think to get their names so that i could at least email the company or something.  I had to post this because a lot of times, people dont leave reviews until something goes wrong but today everything was better than right.

name: Anquenetta Mcadams
text: Walked in to get my son a bed and mattress, this was not my first time purchasing from A F. I also have my king size bedroom set from them. Excellent customer service, very friendly staff and fast service. Thank you American Freight in Helena.

name: KRISSY HIGGINS
text: I ordered furniture at Helena store around end of April 2021. Told furniture would be in May 28. Well May 28 and no furniture. They told me truck does not even deliver until June 9. Finally got order a few days after and it was missing a dresser. I was told it is in Tuscaloosa by mistake. They will go get it. When I get home 1 dresser is damaged. I send pictures to email per Marcus requested. 2 weeks later still no missing dresser or reply about damaged dresser. They tell me that the Forest dale store location has 2 dressers I can go there and get them and bring damage dresser to them. Chasity at Forest dale store is amazing. She was a great help to get this taken care of for me. Although when I get home 1 of the 2 dressers is damaged. Now what? Guess I have to figure how to make defective dresser be ok. I'm not driving a hour back over there for more defective furniture. Never settle for the cheaper price. My granny always said you pay for what you get..

resp.text: We apologize for any inconvenience. Please reach out to the Store Manager at 205-624-4444 to discuss  your experience.

name: Gwendolyn Ivy
text: I purchased a sectional for my den and sofa and love seat for my living room. All pieces were supposed to be delivered on 6/19/2021. I was quoted a delivery fee of 175 because it was coming from Tuscaloosa. Well due to the weather, I received a call at 7pm stating my sectional would be delivered between 12-6on 6/20/2021. When I required about my sofa and loveseat...it's not on this delivery. I was informed I would have to pay another delivery fee for something I had no control over. I have been calling the Helena store since 7:02pm and the line has been busy. I am beyond upset and I am not happy.

resp.text: We apologize for any inconvenience. Please reach out to the Store Manager at 205-624-4444 to discuss your experience.

text: Great, friendly service and I'm always immediately greeted as I come through the door! Everyone is very helpful, and the prices are well worth it. Will definitely make them my go-to :)

text: Marcus Reaves is a great store manager who maintains professionalism while offering impeccable customer service. He is extremely knowledgeable on all of the products offered and answered all of my questions thoroughly. I was able to get everything I needed quickly and easily. I will definitely return in the future.

name: Jacinta Brock
text: Marcus is the absolute best. I came in to the store with an idea of what I wanted. He lead me in the right direction. He even got all of my items deliverd the same day before closing. Best customer service. I will continue to use him for all my furniture needs.

name: Jason Ford
text: Service was great, until they got my signature on everything. We were ASSURED that they can get it on the car and make sure that it wasn't going to move...AT ALL. After I signed for everything, everyone walked away. I had to ask for help to put the mattress on the car and then had to tie it down by myself. Not sure that we will be back for a second experience at this place. Honesty goes a VERY long way with me.

resp.text: Hello Jason, we are sorry to hear about your recent shopping experience. Input about our stores and employees helps improve customer satisfaction and we aim to please. Please call (740)833-6396 so we can put you in direct contact with the Regional Manager of the store location you recently visited. Thank you.

text: Customer service is great...add that with the selection and prices and this place is hard to beat.

name: Steven Knestrict
text:
BUYER BEWARE: When purchasing love seat and sofa a year ago we were told that the additional $100 protection plan would cover these couches for 5 years of ANY accidents (rips, tears, stains, from kids dogs, cats etc.) And that if any occur our living room set would be replaced. This was the main reason we purchased from this company.
1 1/2 years later we find out that none of these things are actually covered under the plan.

We feel we were intentionally misled into paying for a useless service.

Do your business with a company of integrity, but not American Freight of Helena.

resp.text:
We are sorry to hear you are having troubles with your purchase and would like to help as best we can. Please call 1-866-388-6333 so we can put you in direct contact with the Regional Manager of the store location you purchased from.

Thank you.

name: Vivacious Criss
text:
I been a customer every since 2019. Back when Cory and delivery man Lorenzo was there. No problems. My husband purchased the Raspberry Bedroom set. He asked Marcus for the complete set. Marcus was too busy inquiring who my husband was buying the bedroom suit for. That he didn't disclose the set only includes one nightstand. Usually a Queen size bed set has two parties. My husband spent $1,333.16, plus $200.00 for delivery. Just to find out there's only one nightstand.  I called Darnell who accuses me of yelling and I can't fix it, if you don't stop. All bets were off when he made the comment that my husband and I should have looked online.  To see what the order details. Voices on both sides got loud, and Darnell laughs and hangs up. So, if you go to a restaurant, you should already know what's on the menu.  I will not be back and I'm telling my family members who shop here too. Don't!!

Just want to inform the Regional Manager that a paid in full Bedroom Set and Set up, plus tip. A paid in full order that was supposed to be delivered all on Tuesday. The Chess part that they didn't have Tuesday 06/30/2020, and MARCUS said would come Wednesday 07/01/2020, the deliveryman told us 8:30p.m. he was still coming. Only not too show up. And my husband and I didn't get to bed until 12:00a.m., and husband had to be at work 5:00 a.m. the next morning. So, we are going on the third day 07/02/2020, waiting on our $200.00 Raspberry chest, just to call all day. The deliverymen arrived 11:20 p.m., threw the chess down, that was paid to be assembled and left. Need I say more.

resp.text:
We are sorry to hear you are having troubles with your purchase and would like to help as best we can. Please call 1-866-388-6333 so we can put you in direct contact with the Regional Manager of the store location you purchased from.

Thank you.

Darnell said that it may take a little longer for some items to g e t it but for me it wasn't a problem.  I will be purchasing again.  I saw a really pretty rug that would match my furniture exactly.  Thanks American Freight. SD.

text: Definitely had a Great Experience here. Purchase my first set in November and because of the great service, timely delivery. I purchased and set in February. If you go ask for MARCUS, customer service is beyond excellent and assist to customer’s need. Gave him my budget and got everything I needed.

resp.text: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business!

name: Diana Sexton
text: They had terrible delivery service 3  yrs ago, but I gave them a 2nd chance. Nothing has changed. Still terrible. They gave me a 8am-5pm delivery window. At 10am, they called to make sure I was home for delivery. They claimed they had my furniture on the truck for days (I bought it on Friday and they don't deliver on weekends). They said they had been calling me several times. I had 2 missed calls and 1 voicemail (I called back as soon as I got the voicemail). At 1pm, I called to get a status and they said delivery between 12pm-5pm. At 4pm, they called to see if they could deliver. They said they called several times, with messages and a text. 2 calls is not several, 1 voicemail which I returned promptly and no text. Furniture is nice enough, but will never use their delivery again.

name: Sharon Lancaster
text: Marcus was very kind and efficient in knowing the product he was saleing.

name: rashauna carter
text: I must say the staff at the Helena location were amazing. Specifically Darnell and Xavier. I had visited the trussville location and found the item I wanted wasnt in stock but was in Helena. Once I arrived, I found that I had been misinformed by Trussville and the sectional I wanted did not include the ottman as described by other location. After explaining to the Helena staff that I had incurred extra expense making arrangements for pick up and traveled 40min out of the way only to find out item was not sold as a set they went over and beyond to make it right. I came in frustrated and left with a smile. Darnell went the extra mile to accommodate the inconvenience and gained a customer for life. text: Terribly awful experience!! First off, if Marcus is your salesperson expect absolutely nothing to get done or be done right. I ordered a bedroom and living room set over a month ago to be delivered on June 26th. All of my furniture didn't arrive on time... I still haven't received my living room furniture nor an update on when it's expected to arrive. I finally cancelled the order and asked for a refund yesterday. When my bedroom furniture did arrive, the wrong chest was delivered. Also, Marcus claims he forgot to include my bedrails and I didn't have screws for my headboard. The delivery fee was $100, with no assembly. I had to drive back to the store for my bedrails. No considerations nor accommodations were made for me regarding my time or gas even though this order was paid in full and this was a mistake he made. As of yesterday, he still could not give me an update on the status of my living room furniture. I finally spoke with the manager who was unaware of this situation and told me that my complaint was one of many and that Marcus had been demoted. However, this doesn't change the fact that I've been in my house for almost a month with no living room furniture and they've had the payment in full long before I even closed on my house. DON'T ORDER ANYTHING FROM HERE!

name: Adam Huddleston
text:
We bought a new sofa/loveseat combo from them. The pricetag was certainly lower than anywhere else we looked, and it looked like OK quality furniture.
Less than 3 weeks after purchase, the sofa literally fell apart. We're pretty normal sized people and have treated it with care. I turned it over and opened up the upholstery to have a look.  The construction quality is the worst I've ever seen; low grade partical board, half-rotted knotty 1/2" thick pine, and the whole thing is held together with staples.  I identified 6 separate joints that had come apart inside the couch due to the staples simply slipping out of the wood, and many more that were halfway undone.
I ended up taking around 3 or 4 hours and meticulously replacing pieces, reinforcing joints with metal brackets and screws, and closing up places in the upholstery which were mysteriously split and leaking stuffing.

The furniture here is truly of the lowest quality, even if it appears fine on the surface.  If you buy from here, make sure you also purchase their ridiculously expensive warranty (that will tack on $100 - $200 to your purchase), because you're gonna be needing it a whole lot.  If you need cheap furniture, go to the thrift store or use Facebook marketplace. If you want new furniture, spring for something more expensive.

Hello Adam,

We are sorry to hear you are having troubles with your purchase and would like to help as best we can. Please call 1-866-388-6333 so we can put you in direct contact with the Regional Manager of the store location you purchased from.

name: Givon Wayne Gilliam
text:
We bought a floor model and learned a valuable lesson. The couch with chase looked great on the showroom floor and we were very excited to get what we thought was a good deal.

In less than a year the cushions started to shred.  We do not have children and very few guests.  We are very gentle on our furniture.   To our dismay and surprise the couch covering started to disintegrate before our very eyes.   The middle cushion does not even get used at all and it was the first one to split and fray. See photo for what your couch will look like if you buy it from American Freight.

We took the cushions into the store thinking they would honor a 1 year warranty.  Unfortunately because the couch was a floor model it was an “as-is”purchase  and we were out of luck.  American Freight said that there was nothing that they could do.

Here is a warning for you.  If you decide to purchase a floor model, do not be surprised if it does not last one year.  You are buying disposable furniture.  Lesson learned.

name: Amy Thompson
text:
Bought (and financed) two matching recliners on July 21st of 2018. The Helena store only had one so we picked up the other from the Trussville location. Get home to find the Trussville store had given us a broken chair. We return it to the Helena store a few days later and were told they would have to order it and it could take up to 3 weeks to receive the replacement.
We have been very patient, probably to patient...Because here we are 5 months later paying on a chair/recliner that we don't have!
Through these past 5 months there have been countless attempts to reach out to the Helena location, only to be blown off by staff that insist they are oblivious to what is going on and leave me with, "I will have to call you back."
Never to be heard from again until the next time I call or reach out via the American freight website.
This situation has gone on entirely long enough! I personally do not suggest doing business with this company and if you so choose to, just remember, "buyer beware!"

name: Maximillian Martin
text: I was in the store today and I am not able to wear a mask because of my medical conditions. The State of Alabama has legal exemptions in place for those of us with those conditions. I was there with my wife and she was wearing one. The 2 cashiers, after I had been through the store, wanted me to wear one. I told them that I have medical conditions. They not only proceeded to tell me that they wouldn't even check me out but called police to get me to leave. Now, after police got there they decided to let my wife pay for what we got. My wife is black and both cashiers were also, but I'm not. After  seeing proof from a doctor,  they still refused to help me even though they asked me for it. After I walked out they eventually checked her out. Now I'm no expert on discrimination,  but they saw us walk in together and she put one on but I didn't and I would think that they would have been able to figure out why I didn't,  but they didn't even ask. And there have also been other people in the store without masks, including their workers because I've done it before and no one ever said a word to me, even one who was there today was working without one. Something sounds a little fishy about their actions

Ben does need to learn some customer relationship skills are find another place to be Employed!

name: Olivia Richey
text: We had the best experience here!  My husband and I went to Ashley furniture first and checked out the mattress sale.  The next stop was mattress firm in Gardendale.  A friend recommended we check out Dovers.  That was divine intervention.  We got more for less at Dovers.  I recommend them to anyone looking for a mattress. It has literally changed my life. I am sleeping so much better.  Not near as many aches and pains. We never could have afforded what we got there anywhere else.  2 thumbs up!  I wish I had more thumbs to give them!

resp.text:
Richey family thank you for the wonderful 5 star two thumbs up review. We appreciate your business We know that there are many options when buying a mattress and we strive to be the best in customer service & price. Thank you for giving us the opportunity to help y’all find the mattress that y’all need.
Nicholas Dover

name: Ruby Watson
text: Nice guys work here. Variety of mattresses that can fit most people's needs.

resp.text: Ruby, we appreciate the 5 star rating and comments. We work hard to be nice and have a great selection of mattresses. Thank you for your business!

name: Ann Turner
text:
On Jul 9, 2020, at 8:58 AM, Ann Turner <angeldat46@yahoo.com> wrote:

Thank you Mr. Dover for taking your time to get back to me over the July 4th holiday. I wasn’t expecting to hear from anyone during the holiday but I did Visit your Fultondale location on Tuesday and spoke with Dustin. Yes he is a very nice young man. We have bought a full size mattress set. It was only $500. but Dustin was very helpful and I would highly recommend him and your establishment in the future. Thank you again.  👍🏻😊
Mr. & Mrs. Steve Turner

resp.text: Thank you for the 5 star review!!!

name: Chip C
text: The salesman was very helpful and informative, not pushy at all. We took our time and found a name brand mattress at a great price. The delivery guys were great, we literally had it in our house 30 minutes after we bought it

resp.text:
Thank you for the review. We are glad you enjoyed your experience. Sleep
Well.

name: Senior Living Guide
text: Drove to this place from south Birmingham and it was worth it. The prices are great.

resp.text: Thank you for taking time to review our location we really appreciate it!!

name: Scott Little
text: Very helpful. DUSTIN was great in providing information without trying to push a certain brand on us. Customer service was great.  Recommend anyone to come in and check them out.

resp.text: Scott, thank you for taking time to leave a review. We enjoy helping customers find a mattress that fits their needs. Thank you for your business we appreciate you.

name: Carrie Noles
text: Dustin & Devonte were great!! They are very knowledgeable & not only did they answer all of the questions we had, they offered information that we needed to make an informed decision. These guys were very patient with me (as I went from mattress to mattress) & helped us find the perfect mattress for us!! If you're shopping for a new mattress, I highly recommend Dover's in Fultondale!! Thanks guys.. y'all are awesome😃!!

resp.text: Carrie, we are so glad you found the perfect mattress and are happy! Thank you for your recommendation and we appreciate you!

name: Melissa Garner
text: Found this business on FB. Both gentlemen that helped me with my purchase were extremely helpful and courteous. They were busy (it was a Saturday afternoon), but took the time to pull mattresses down so I could lie on them and compare. Went over the warranty/return policy and loaded the mattress I bought and made sure it was securely strapped in my truck. I checked online and I would have paid double for the mattress I bought, had I gone retail. Will definitely use Dover's the next time I have to buy a mattress.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words. We appreciate our customers. We love helping people sleep great at a discounted price. We can't wait to see you again! Sleep good

name: Chuck Missildine
text: Very clean establishment. I literally did not see one piece of paper or similar debris on the floor. Shelves were nicely organized with price tags, clearance racks and store personel easy to find. Everyone (employees and customers alike) was wearing their masks and following social distancing guidelines which made the whole experience even more pleasant since I was shopping with several friends including my one year old great niece and a lifelong friend who has an extremely compromised  immune system from struggles with Crohn's disease. Scored a ton of bargains on name brands and designer's fashions. Seriously, I got my great niece a pair of sneakers and a pair of adorable boots for only $2 each. By the way, they were made by none other than the legendary JUICY COUTURE. I would have had to shell out another $45-$65 if I had purchased these designer's labels from elsewhere.  I felt practically criminal after swiping a game carrying case plus a glass screen protector (two separate items) for my son's NINTENDO SWITCH. I paid $5 for both which saved me about $15 and earned me HUGE POINTS with my son. How about this bit of awesomeness: $3 for Beyonce Pulse perfume, 3.4 ounce bottle, normally $15 or more. I also grabbed 2 hoodies for $1 each. And whatever you do, do NOT get me started on the huge savings and discounts I racked up on for the rest of the clothing that I bought as an early birthday present to myself.

I told the cashier I was picking up two online orders after a purchase. She looked it up, and instead of picking up my items from the cage of online orders in the front, calling someone to grab the one in the back, and having me step to the side for two minutes (as would be common sense), she told me I'd have to go pick them up at customer service, which already had a large line, because she didn't want to hold up the people in line. Thanks to her, I lost about 40 minutes of my life standing in K-Mart.

It had actually gotten stolen from where I laid it down by another customer. They both watched the cameras without hesitation for over and hour and was able to track down my phone for me. And when I say no one there I mean no one. Not even a cashier. But to be honest I mean this in a very good way. Because of there isnt anyone there to check out or even a cashier behind the counter then that means the cashier is out on the floor return products erroneously brought to the at the register. resp.text: Thank you so much for your review. We very much appreciate your business and we can't wait to have you back!

name: Jacob Lee
text: By far the best Pawn Shop in the area! Competent and very friendly staff and a very nice and clean place. The staff were knowledgeable and made appropriate and competitive offers for the items I wanted to pawn or sell. It was refreshing to walk into a pawn shop that felt like an actual store, compared to most Pawn Shops that have product in disarray on the shelves and you feel dirty when you leave. Keep up the good work guys!

resp.text: We appreciate your business!

name: Brittney Kirkland
text: I got my wedding ring sized through them within the last 2 weeks. When I got to the car my husband realized that the piece that connected the 2 rings together was broken off. Took it immediately back into the shop and the older woman working there told him that it was “probably removed for sizing”. Spoke with 2 jewelers from 2 other business to verify that it should have been removed and both of them said that there would have been absolutely no need in removing that part and that it was probably done accidentally and they are just saying that it “had to be removed” to cover themselves and not take ownership.  I absolutely will not go to money mizer again. And to think that my husband was about to purchase 2 guns from this location this month. We will definitely be taking our business elsewhere from now on, as will my entire family.

resp.text: Thank you for your review. Management has just became aware of this incident. Please reach out to our store manager, Ashley, regarding this and we will be more than happy to assist you and rectify the troubles you have had regarding the resizing of the wedding set.

name: MIsael Arenas
text:
Went in to inquire about some handguns, one man was behind the counter on the phone and did not acknowledge us there. Another couple male and female was behind main counter, no greeting nor asked if we needed help today? Ever other shop I been to knows how to greet you.
From the looks of the shop it did not have many items to bargain for. Guns where over priced by hundreds even shotgun over priced. Not many electronic.

resp.text: We apologize for your unsatisfactory customer service. We do pride ourselves on our customer service and are sincerely sorry if you were not helped or felt ignored. It was not our intention to upset you and would be more than happy to try to make things right. We are willing to price match any item we can as well as are willing to work with any price on used items. We are low on electronics becasue of the holiday sales we have been having and have sold out of most, however, we do have new items that come out every day. Please come down and let us make things right. Thank you for shopping with us in the first place and we do hope to see you again soon.

name: Sarah Lawrence
text: Clean and organized inside! Staff is amazing! They are very friendly and knowledgeable! Wonderful experience overall.

resp.text: We are glad you enjoyed your experience with Money Mizer!

name: Casandra Ridgell
text: I have always had great shopping experiences at this location. The staff is super friendly, very helpful, and knowledgeable about items in their store. Charlotte knows us by name and she’s knows what we like to buy. She’s always ready to tell us what she has waiting when we walk in the door. I would recommend this store if you like pawn shopping.

resp.text: We appreciate your business!

name: Ike Bubins
text: Worst gun shop I've ever been to. Called on the phone and put me on hold. I finally drove down there I wanted a holster and the man pointed to the end of the counter and said they're down there. No help sad pathetic Gun Shop

resp.text: Thank you for your review. We do apologize for any troubles you encountered with us. If you were placed on hold and not gotten back to, it was only because of how extremely busy we we can be at times. It is never our intention to make customers feel like we are ignoring them and if you come back down, we would be more than glad to help you with anything you need. We pride ourselves in customer service and will do whatever it takes to make sure our customers are happy.

text: I have Purchased numerous Items from this location with no issues and great prices.  I went in to sell them an item and they insulted me with the offer.  I understand they need to make money and never wanted full price for the value.  I even had an official appraisal letter and they didn’t even come within 25% of the value.  I was told it was because they could not find anything like it on the “auction” web site they use. Disappointing visit.  Will never return.

resp.text: We are very sorry you feel like our offer was unfair. We do appreciate the feedback.

Haven't tried it yet but if you need a cheap good mattress this place hasn't disappointed.

I asked for change for a dollar, so we could try once more....not for our money back. The cashier said she has to have someone pay cash before she can open a register.... understandable...however the second lady just said they can't give change. Even though we just lost money in their store and we weren't asking for our money back. I just think it's bad customer service and to be frank just flat out RUDE...  I run a business as well and sometimes you do what it takes to make your customers happy. I understand this is a dollar store but you get paid hourly just like everyone else and I expect good customer service.

text: I went into the store to pick up a $1 soda. My total was $1.10 I handed the cashier a $10 bill and a Quarter. The cashier gave me back 15 cents. I told the cashier that i gave him a $10 bill and a Quarter. The cashier stated they were not sure what bill i gave them they assumed it was a dollar bill. The manager proceeded to attempt to count down the drawer but it was taking a long timee i told them i had my dog in the hot car. After i continued to complain about how long it was taking rather rudely i confess eventually i was given back my $10 bill and quarter an asked to leave without my merchandise. i had to use extra gas money to go to another store for that store not to have what i was looking for. The employees @ this dollar tree are rude unprofessional and untrained in operating a register. Corporate needs to retrain these employees and monitor the customer service of these store employees. Next time i have a problem at this store imma file a discrimination law suit.

text: I once gave this store a 5 star rating but I don't understand why these store employees have a problem with me getting cleaning supplies. Sure I get what I see, I have had close family members with COVID and even one to pass from it. Not only that I gift to the elderly that can't get out and get some. Now they don't put anything on the shelves. The manager, Stephen, whom I thought was so friendly, told one of my white friends that a lady comes in and gets all their supplies. I guess that's why nothing is even on their shelves anymore. I drive almost two hours to find supplies for myself, my kids, and others. I know for a fact they had 22 units as they called the boxes and then another truck. So tell me why they didn't put out any supplies: Disinfectant wipes, lysol, microban, dg disinfectants or alcohol. I find it hard to believe that out of 4 loads not one single cleaning items. My money is green to. I have an autoimmune disease and I need stuff myself. I have spent $650 in one month at these dollar generals because Aliceville don't have any. They are  not too friendly anymore. I guess they see my face too much but they don't mind taking my  money for other stuff that I purchase.

Im sure once the District Manager pops by, this will end and a new more efficient person will take the reigns. The store itself is beautiful and the employees are absolutely wonderful customer service pros!

name: Doug Benefield
text: Big Lots is a cool little mid-sized retail store that surprisingly has survived in this day and age I think they have a cool furniture line actually even Walmart doesn't have furniture. They have nice recliners in beds and have a credit system where you can actually pay on credit for that as far as everything else they have all your basic little home supplies add cleaning supplies personal hygiene and basic tools they're different kind of store something you think of 20 or 30 years ago but I enjoy going there and it's refreshing to have a smaller place to shop

name: Eden Smith
text: Just went in to look at furniture to further furnish our home and had a great experience. We were greeted promptly and asked if we needed assistance. Loria was quick to show us around at all of the dressers and chest of drawers and night stands they had available. She explained the progressive leasing in a way that we understood and even gave us a tip on how to save a little money when we finally were ready to purchase our bedroom furniture. We came in unsure of the style or even what color scheme we wanted and we left with furniture picked out and even the total price of everything. We will definitely be using big lots for all of our furniture needs

name: LaNissa Burton
text: Went here about a week ago. Never really understood the store concept or why we had one, when there is a big lots next door. This is MY NEW FAVORITE STORE. I took my time looked around and I can tell you I wanted to load up two carts. They sell everything: furniture, kitchen, bedding, specialty food, pet supplies, etc. The prices and quality are great. Stop by the one across from the Auburn  Mall. The sales associates are helpful and kind. Thanks Kelvin.

name: Tori Thomas
text:
Definitely won’t ever be going back to this store, especially not this location. Employees are rude, and were pretty useless. Didn’t understand how to break change for the lady who checked out in front of me, and then when I tried to buy an item that was marked with 59.30 under the word “closeout” I was told that wasn’t actually a price drop, then she stormed off to find some other useless employee who comes to tell me it isn’t the price but instead a section number of the store. If that’s not the dumbest thing I’ve ever seen then the sky isn’t blue. It was literally laid out like this:

Retail 199.99
Closeout 59.30

What would you assume? Who does that to customers? Not a great business.. and employees acted as if that’s common sense that the section number of the store would be hand written where a price would normally go.

This was my first time ever shopping in a Tuesday Morning and it will for sure be my very last.

text:
Privately owned business.  Manager wasn't helpful to me as I browsed the store to PURCHASE  a washer/dryer, yet he spent a lot  of time with an inquiry from another gentleman.
Manager finally paid attention to me when I went to the register to purchase a stove cleaning product.
I made up in my mind right then that there wasn't anything that I wanted from this particular store, even though I love Kenmore appliances.

resp.text: Deborah, we truly apologize for the less than satisfactory experience. We are locally owned and presevere to provide the lcoal community with the best service possbile. We have ramped up our staffing levels. Kindly stop by our location for any future needs and let us know how we are doing. We appreacite your feedback and your business. Thank you

name: Jessica Jones
text: We bought our washer/dryer a couple of years ago from them and have loved it. We had an issue with our washer leaking and called another local repair service who came out and charged us $140 to look around and say they couldn’t fix it. We called Sears Hometown Repair in Foley and they quickly sent out Daniel who opened the washing machine and said it was a simple fix with the hose!! I told him about the other repair company and he was gracious enough to track down the part we needed and come out the following day and fix it!!! He only charged us $100 for the part AND labor for both days!!! Can’t brag on him enough as well as this store. They are honest, efficient and very professional. Thank y’all again!
